trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn's eyes light up when he sees you.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_01<tab>Though eager to return to the void and resume the search for his sister, Varshahn has had no choice but to wait for Y'shtola's efforts to bear fruit. As he confesses restlessness at the lack of glad tidings, Zero makes an appearance─albeit one she intends to be brief, as she is heading out to “replenish her aether” shortly. Somewhat surprisingly, she extends an invitation to you and the satrap to join her, and so the three of you make your way to the bazaar.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_02<tab>Zero's business in the bazaar transpires to be the acquisition of supplementary spice that Mehryde requires to satisfy Zero's particular tastes. Delighted to find his regular customer in the company of others, the merchant is happy to make your acquaintance and cheerfully suggests you select an additional spice to blend with today's order.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_03<tab>After much deliberation, you make your choice. All that's left is to sample it...and pray that your taste buds can weather the coming storm.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_04<tab>Satisfied by your colorful reaction, Zero accepts your selection of spice and proceeds without hesitation to Mehryde's Meyhane. She doubtless expects you to follow, once you have regained your composure.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_05<tab>With Zero's blessing, Mehryde makes a full kettle of intensely spicy curry and offers it to the meyhane at large. The casualties are considerable, but the people nevertheless appreciate the delicious agony. After watching you and Zero sup on some curry yourself, Varshahn suggests delivering a meal to Estinien, whom he suspects has returned to his chambers in Meghaduta.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SEQ_06<tab>Masala has been delivered and misunderstandings averted by the time Y'shtola and Urianger arrive with good news. It seems you may be able to reach Golbez and Azdaja on the Thirteenth's moon by way of a gate opened from Mare Lamentorum. Opening said gate will be no small feat, however, as it will require channeling vast amounts of aether to the moon by way of the Tower of Babil. Much and more must be prepared in order to execute this plan, and so your comrades part ways to attend to their respective tasks─Y'shtola to the moon for preparations, and Estinien to escort Nidhana and a cohort of alchemists to meet her there. Urianger would have your help readying other necessities, the details of which he is eager to impart...
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Zero.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_TODO_01<tab>Select a spice.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_TODO_02<tab>Taste the spice in Zero's presence.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Zero.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the Meghaduta attendant.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, 'tis good to see you. Have you any news from Old Sharlayan?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_001<tab>We've yet to hear from Y'shtola regarding her search for a means to return to the void. I must confess that her silence has left me feeling...restless.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_002<tab>Nor am I alone in this─Estinien has such an excess of energy that he has been helping to train our soldiers with nary a grumble.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_003<tab>As for Zero...
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_005<tab>Is something the matter?

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_006<tab>No, no. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> paid us a visit, and so I was apprising <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> of recent developments─or the lack thereof.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_100_006<tab>Are you heading somewhere?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_007<tab>Aye. To replenish my aether.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_008<tab>...Would you like to come?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_009<tab>A rare but most welcome invitation! Timely too, I might add.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_010<tab>I myself was thinking of venturing out into the city. It would be my pleasure to join you.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_011<tab>You will accompany us, of course?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_012<tab>Come, then. I've an errand to run at the bazaar first.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_020<tab>If you would gauge the city's prosperity, there is no surer way than to visit the bazaar and observe the people. This I learned from Ahewann and his predecessors.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_025<tab>You're with Mistress Zero? How rare to see her with others!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_030<tab>I'm picking up some more spice. Mehryde told me to do so before my next visit.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_032<tab>Mistress Zero has quite the tolerance, you see. The Sisters know we Hannish are fond of spicy food, but I doubt any of us could keep up with her.

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_033<tab>With just the spices they normally have on hand, the meyhane can't quite satisfy her. Which is why I'm happy to provide what they need to achieve more rigorous flavors!

TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_034<tab>Now then, variety being the <var 1A 02 /var>spice<var 1A 01 /var> of life, perhaps you'd like to choose something extra to blend with Mistress Zero's usual?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_035<tab>It'll help to keep things interesting! What do you say?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_036<tab>Fine by me. You can appreciate the nuances of this world's sustenance far better than I can, I expect.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_040<tab>What impressive samples. You'll not find a larger or finer selection in all the world.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_045<tab>So long as it's stimulating, I care not what you choose.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_050<tab>You're welcome to sample the spices, but bear in mind that what I recommend to Mistress Zero is <var 1A 02 /var>potent<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>A colorful array of spices peer out from hempen sacks.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_Q1_000_000<tab>Which will you consider?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_A1_000_001<tab>The lustrous crimson powder.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_A1_000_002<tab>The aromatic black corns.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_A1_000_003<tab>The little red husks.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_A1_000_004<tab>The coarse yellow flakes.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_A1_000_005<tab>Never mind.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Bright red in color, this powder is hot just to look at. It will likely induce a healthy sweat when consumed.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>These corns tickle your nose with their pungent-yet-enticing aroma. One can imagine them lending dishes an appetizing accent.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>These tiny husks give off a citrus-like scent. Perhaps they will imbue dishes with a zesty note.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>These flakes appear to have been grated from a thick root. Their sharp aroma suggests a bracing flavor.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_Q1_000_065<tab>Select this spice?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_067<tab>Ah, that's a fine choice. But don't take my word for it─here, have a taste!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_068<tab>Zero may wish to observe your reaction. It would be considerate to sample the spice in her presence.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_070<tab>I doubt you need to be told this, but have care not to take too much at once...
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_075<tab>Well?
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_080<tab>Go on, then! Have a taste and see what you think.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>Zero may wish to observe your reaction. It would be considerate to sample the spice in her presence.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_091<tab>You tentatively place some of the spice on your tongue...
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>A veritable blaze engulfs your mouth!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>An intense and aromatic heat fills your nostrils!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_094<tab>A tingling, tangy numbness grips your mouth!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_095<tab>A jolt of fire courses through your entire body!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_096<tab>Your reaction speaks volumes.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_096<tab>That will suffice, then.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_097<tab>Always a pleasure, Mistress Zero! And do give Mehryde my regards.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_100<tab>I am pleased to see that Zero has become a regular here, and so much so as to bring her own spice.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SPICEMERCHANT04735_000_105<tab>Give Mehryde my regards!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MEHRYDE_000_110<tab>Welcome to Mehryde's Meyhane!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_SYSTEM_000_115<tab>The spicy curry has left you slightly flushed and set your heart racing. Whatever challenges await, you are ready to face them head-on─and with feeling!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_VARSHAHN_000_120<tab>I did not expect so many to take up the challenge, but I am glad to see everyone enjoying themselves.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_125<tab>I'm satisfied.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MEHRYDE_000_130<tab>Well, that proved to be an exciting event! I daresay word of Zero's singular curry will draw more diners to our establishment.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_MIHLEEL_000_135<tab>What a remarkable curry! I must try a bowl myself─when I can muster the courage, that is!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_RHULMEIRA_000_140<tab>Quite an adventurous crowd we had today. A few drinks will do that to you. For better or worse...
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_ARDARACA_000_145<tab>A traveler, are you? Well, I'm no layabout. I'm simply recovering from that fiery devastation, you understand.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_DARFIYE_000_150<tab>Drink, dance, and damned good curry! It couldn't possibly get better than this in Radz-at-Han!
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_HANNISHMAN04735B_000_155<tab>By the Sisters, I thought that curry would be the end of me. I...I must eat it again.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_HANNISHMAN04735A_000_160<tab>My poor nose... It still tingles...
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_EGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_180<tab>Welcome back.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_EGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_181<tab>Master Estinien? Yes, he has returned to his chambers. I shall be happy to escort you.
TEXT_AKTKMK101_04735_Q2_000_182<tab>Proceed to Estinien's chambers?
